Title: Testing, CI and i18n

Description:
Add unit and integration tests, end-to-end tests, and CI workflows. Add i18n support for multiple locales (start with `en` and `uk`).

Acceptance criteria:
- Jest/pytest tests and Cypress e2e config added and passing locally.
- GitHub Actions workflow for test and lint on PRs.
- Basic i18n support and locale switching on frontend.

Labels: ci, tests, frontend
Estimate: M
